manifest.description: This plugin provides an initial support for viewing files with .qmd extension. QMD files contain a combination of markdown and executable code cells and are a format supported by Quarto open source publishing system.
manifest.name: qmd as md
manifest.author: Daniel Borek

data.manifestValue: This plugin provides an initial support for viewing files with .qmd extension. QMD files contain a combination of markdown and executable code cells and are a format supported by Quarto open source publishing system.
data.communityListValue: View files with .qmd extension. QMD files contain a combination of Markdown and executable code cells and are a format supported by Quarto open source publishing system.
